channel.title: Server not Opening to Public
channel.description:
:) Hey guys, I am in dire need of help. :)
My problem is I can't open my server to the public. I have been using a status checker on another website to see if my server (when running) allows public access. It does not :(. I have done everything from Port Forwarding to No-Ip. I quite possibly could have made a mistake. I am not sure what the problem is but I can tell you I did what the tutorials tells me.
I did these.. [b] [ul][li]PFed my router (TCP - 43594 - and the IPv4 from my IPConfig[/li] [li]Set up the No-Ip and put in my IPv4 from my IPConfig[/li][/ul]
I am open to using TeamViewer so you could be more hands on when trying to help.

item.title: Server not Opening to Public
item.dc:creator: @lary370 lary370
item.description:
@lary370 wrote:

Would you like me to teamviewer with you?
It would be easier for me to help you solve it.

Read full topic

item.title: Server not Opening to Public
item.dc:creator: @Defiance Defiance
item.description:
@Defiance wrote:

Hey guys, I am in dire need of help.

My problem is I can’t open my server to the public. I have been using a status checker on another website to see if my server (when running) allows public access. It does not :(.
I have done everything from Port Forwarding to No-Ip. I quite possibly could have made a mistake. I am not sure what the problem is but I can tell you I did what the tutorials tells me.

I did these…
[b]
[ul][li]PFed my router (TCP - 43594 - and the IPv4 from my IPConfig[/li]
[li]Set up the No-Ip and put in my IPv4 from my IPConfig[/li][/ul]

I am open to using TeamViewer so you could be more hands on when trying to help.

Read full topic
